member_organisations:
EPA members are: Roquette, Cargill, Tereos, Beneo, DuPont, Merck. 
http://www.polyols-eu.com/membership.php
eu_initiatives: Food safety (re-evaluation food additives), nutrition policy (health and nutrition claims), food information
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
EPA is a member of EU Specialty Food Ingredients. 
EPA has the Observer status at Codex Alimentarius.
goals__remit:
EPA is an association of European manufacturers of food polyols, created to represent their professional interests. 
 
The objectives of EPA are to: 
 
- defend and respresent the interests of the Members at the level of the European Union and other European and international bodies 
- undertake detailed intra-industry discussion and analysis of the impact of the EU food legislation on industry's operations.
relevant_communication: Regular updates of EPA website to inform about applications, technological uses and legislation applying to polyols
